mapper.select: select a.TRAINNUMBER, a.TRAINDATE, a.STATIONORDER, a.ARRIVETIME, a.LEAVETIME, a.REMAININGSEAT, a.DURATION from Time a, Time b where a.TRAINNUMBER = b.TRAINNUMBER and a.STATION = #{start} and b.STATION = #{arrive} and a.TRAINDATE = #{date} and b.TRAINDATE = #{date} and a.STATIONORDER < b.STATIONORDER
select STATIONORDER from Time where TRAINNUMBER = #{trainnumber} and TRAINDATE = #{traindate} and STATION = #{station}
select REMAININGSEAT from Time where TRAINNUMBER = #{trainnumber} and TRAINDATE = #{traindate} and STATIONORDER = #{stationorder}
